snowyseshi.balance: Artery bleedrate increased, CON affects bloodloss less.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Ascending as vamp lord not giving 2 of each stats to your direct subordinates

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Ordinator Broadsword + Shield weapon archetype spawns with their bag and keys

snowyseshi.image: ancient sprites moved into other DMI files
